project.name: Orion Edge Gateway
project.scope: API gateway, rate limiting, auth integration

sections.title: Introduction & Context
sections.goal: Establish rapport and get high-level overview of the interviewee’s role in Orion Edge Gateway project
sample_questions: Can you briefly describe your role and responsibilities in the Orion Edge Gateway build phase?
What are the primary reliability objectives for the gateway service?
Which runbooks or SLAs are most relevant to your daily work on this project?

sections.title: Incident Response & Runbook Usage
sections.goal: Understand how the interviewee applies runbooks like RB-GW-011 during incidents
sample_questions: Walk me through a recent deployment incident and how you applied RB-GW-011.
How do you verify that rolling deployments meet SLA-ORI-02’s latency targets?
What heuristics do you use when deciding between rollback and forward-fix?

sections.title: Cross-System Dependencies
sections.goal: Identify how Orion Edge Gateway interacts with other systems like Aegis IAM and Poseidon Networking
sample_questions: How does the gateway’s mTLS auth integrate with Poseidon’s service mesh policies?
Describe a scenario where IAM’s JIT access policy affected gateway deployments.
How do you coordinate changes with other teams to avoid breaking cross-service authentication flows?

sections.title: Performance & Scaling Challenges
sections.goal: Explore how p95 latency and rate limiting are monitored and tuned during build phase
sample_questions: What tools or telemetry pipelines do you rely on to monitor SLA-ORI-02 compliance?
Can you share an example where rate limiting settings had to be adjusted under load?
How do you simulate traffic patterns to validate scaling strategies?

sections.title: Decision Making & Risk Management
sections.goal: Discuss tradeoffs between velocity and reliability, and evidence-based decision making
sample_questions: Tell me about a decision where you had to choose between meeting a release deadline and mitigating a reliability risk.
What evidence did you gather to support that decision?
How do you document and communicate these tradeoffs to stakeholders?

sections.title: Wrap-Up & Lessons Learned
sections.goal: Summarize key insights and personal takeaways from working on Orion Edge Gateway
sample_questions: What have been your biggest lessons learned regarding reliability in this build phase?
If you could update one runbook or SLA based on recent experience, which would it be and why?
Any advice for new SREs joining the Orion Edge Gateway project?
